ModuleDescription:
This module covers the fundamental principles of planning and designing of facilities such as space allocation, planning and implementation. The topics include facilities management planning process, space and design basics, human factors, universal design, programming, site analysis, master planning, environmental planning, capital planning, space management, design for various facility
types.
Prerequisite: PF2102/PF2501 Structural Systems (AY2014/15 to AY2017/18 intakes)
